bioconda.name: bioconductor-viper
bioconda.summary: Virtual Inference of Protein-activity by Enriched Regulon analysis

biotools.summary: The package uses gene expression data to Infer protein activity. The package uses VIPER and msVIPER algorithms.

bioschemas.name: viper
bioschemas.summary: The package uses gene expression data to Infer protein activity. The package uses VIPER and msVIPER algorithms.
